name: GRAPPLE MANIA
description:
Action packed VR grappling game.

Your objective is simple. Use the grapple gun to navigate your way through the levels, while firing at enemies, also beware of the turrets and lasers, otherwise you will start again. 

Get through the level the fastest and claim your spot on top of the leader board.

WARNING!

This game is still in development and only a small DEMO is currently available.
